message: YAMLWTF

Any ideas why that's wrong?
@steveivy try to add some quotes: title: "On a Roll: StatsD from Perl"
maybe try enclosing the title in double quotes, that way the colon in the title should not be parsed as YAML syntax
generally I try and put any yaml strings in quotes if they're more than one word
You have a colon in your string, so it can't tell
yeah, trying wrapping strings now; also, learning that i have to escape any double quotes in the titles
You can use single quotes, or indent stuff by two spaces

find_any_repo: "Find any repository"
    git_definition:
      Git is an extremely fast, efficient, distributed version control system
      ideal for the collaborative development of software.

anything that starts with a number is assumed to be an actual number, not a string
